document.full_text: lawyers defending former illinois governor rod blagojevich said they will call witnesses to testify next week at his second corruption trial, a strategy reversal from his first trial when no defense witnesses took the stand.
document.title: blagojevich trial defense to call witnesses next week
lines_and_colors: lawyers defending former illinois governor rod blagojevich said they will call witnesses to testify next week at his second corruption trial, a strategy reversal from his first trial when no defense witnesses took the stand.
